description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Second Festival of the Sons of New Hampshire celebrated in Boston ... 1853; including also an account of the proceedings ... on the day of the funeral ... and the subsequent obsequies commemorative of the death of Daniel Webster" Author: FELTON, Alexander C.
